Home.p: Specialized in creating modern, high-quality digital experiences

About.title: Who I am
About.text: My name is Giovane Bolsoni, an enthusiast of technology and web development. I'm interested in developing innovative and effective solutions that make the user experience more intuitive and effective. I'm always looking for knowledge and challenges that allow me to evolve as a developer and contribute in a relevant way.

items.description: Responsible for maintaining and evolving web systems, developing new components and features with Vue.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Focused on clean code, performance, and collaboration within a multidisciplinary team.
items.technologies: Vue.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Pinia, Vite e TailwindCSS.

items.description: Creation of custom layouts and performance optimization of e-commerces. Ensuring fast, functional, and visually attractive websites.
Customization of virtual stores and technical support to meet specific client demands. Integration with platforms like Google Analytics and Ads.
Computer maintenance, including cleaning and parts replacement, to ensure the full functioning of the equipment. Support for the academic technological environment.
Development and maintenance of static pages for our clients, with a focus on functionality and visual creation, improving online presence.
